section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit:
The Association’s purposes are to represent and promote the development of the business interests of its members in the field of development finance and, in relation thereto: 
(1) To facilitate and to further develop the co-operation between its members. 
(2) To facilitate and to further develop the relations between its members and the institutions of the European Union, notably the European Commission and the European Investment Bank. 
(3) To strengthen the access of its members to information on matters related to the European Union. 
(4) To inform the European Union and its institutions on the role and potential of its members as instruments and agencies for development finance. 
(5) To stimulate the exchange of knowledge and expertise by organising seminars and courses as well as to facilitate meetings of interest groups. 
(6) To co-ordinate activities aimed at strengthening reciprocal interests. 
(7) To initiate and publish studies and to organise meetings and conferences for its members.
